# Start an enquiry

This form is for victims who lived with their abuser between 1 August 1964 and 1 October 1979. It includes those who, because of the ‘same roof’ rule:

* had compensation claims rejected
* did not apply for compensation

> * If the ‘same roof’ rule did not affect you, you must use our online application service.

## Before you start
You will need:

* your previous application reference numbers if you have applied before
* a phone number we contact you on

You should be aware that we will:

* only contact you by telephone
* assess your application against the requirements of the current Criminal Injuries Compensation Scheme

## Other ways to start an enquiry
If you cannot use the online form there are other ways you can start your enquiry.

### Telephone
From the UK: 0300 003 360, select option 8
Overseas: +44 (0)203 684 2517
Find out about call charges

### Email
SRR@cica.gov.uk

### Post
Post Criminal Injuries Compensation Authority
Alexander Bain House
Atlantic Quay
15 York Street
Glasgow
G2 8JQ
United Kingdom

### Support
For practical or emotional support visit the Victim and Witness infomation websites:

* England and Wales
* Scotland
